Day 1 (March 27th): Austin to Detroit

* Departure from Austin at 6:00 AM
* Flight F3518857 from Austin to Detroit, departing at 05:36 AM and arriving at 09:33 AM ($419 per person)

Day 2 (March 28th): Detroit

* Check-in at a private room accommodation in Detroit ($1149 per night)
* Visit the Henry Ford Museum of American Innovation and Technology ($20 per person)
* Explore the Renaissance Center ($10 per person)
* Enjoy dinner at a local restaurant ($30 per person)

Day 3 (March 29th): Detroit to Alpena

* Departure from Detroit at 11:24 AM
* Flight F3537671 from Detroit to Alpena, departing at 11:24 AM and arriving at 15:17 PM ($330 per person)

Day 4 (March 30th): Alpena

* Check-in at a private room accommodation in Alpena ($169 per night)
* Visit the Thunder Bay Marina and Park ($10 per person)
* Explore the city of Alpena ($20 per person)
* Enjoy dinner at a local restaurant ($30 per person)

Day 5 (March 31st): Return to Austin

* Departure from Alpena at 11:00 AM
* Flight F385219 from Alpena to Austin, departing at 11:00 AM and arriving at 12:55 PM ($78 per person)

Budget Breakdown:

* Flights: $169 x 3 = $507
* Accommodations: $169 x 4 = $676
* Transportation: $78 x 2 = $156
* Food and activities: $30 x 5 = $150

Total budget: $5,900

Note: The above itinerary is just a suggestion and can be customized based on individual preferences and schedules. Also, please check the latest travel restrictions and guidelines before planning your trip.
